name: 9to5 - Get in: Get paid: Get out
name_original: 9to5 - Get in: Get paid: Get out
description:
How long can you do nothing productive?
Get your regular dose of caffeine and get ready for your busy day! You need to spend your time without working as long as you can.

- Show the recepcionist your new dance move!
- Print the lyrics of the songs you're singing at the karaoke happy hour!
- Fire someone!
- Pretend you slip on hall's capet so you can leave early!
- Draw a moustache on the employee of the month photo!

Time is your biggest enemy.
